00012         template <typename T, precision P> 
00013         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat2x2<T, P> rowMajor2
00014         (
00015                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & v1, 
00016                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & v2
00017         )
00018         {
00019                 detail::tmat2x2<T, P> Result;
00020                 Result[0][0] = v1.x;
00021                 Result[1][0] = v1.y;
00022                 Result[0][1] = v2.x;
00023                 Result[1][1] = v2.y;
00024                 return Result;
00025         }
00026 
00027         template <typename T, precision P> 
00028         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat2x2<T, P> rowMajor2(
00029                 const detail::tmat2x2<T, P>& m)
00030         {
00031                 detail::tmat2x2<T, P> Result;
00032                 Result[0][0] = m[0][0];
00033                 Result[0][1] = m[1][0];
00034                 Result[1][0] = m[0][1];
00035                 Result[1][1] = m[1][1];
00036                 return Result;
00037         }
00038 
00039         template <typename T, precision P> 
00040         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3<T, P> rowMajor3(
00041                 const detail::tvec3<T, P>& v1, 
00042                 const detail::tvec3<T, P>& v2, 
00043                 const detail::tvec3<T, P>& v3)
00044         {
00045                 detail::tmat3x3<T, P> Result;
00046                 Result[0][0] = v1.x;
00047                 Result[1][0] = v1.y;
00048                 Result[2][0] = v1.z;
00049                 Result[0][1] = v2.x;
00050                 Result[1][1] = v2.y;
00051                 Result[2][1] = v2.z;
00052                 Result[0][2] = v3.x;
00053                 Result[1][2] = v3.y;
00054                 Result[2][2] = v3.z;
00055                 return Result;
00056         }
00057 
00058         template <typename T, precision P> 
00059         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3<T, P> rowMajor3(
00060                 const detail::tmat3x3<T, P>& m)
00061         {
00062                 detail::tmat3x3<T, P> Result;
00063                 Result[0][0] = m[0][0];
00064                 Result[0][1] = m[1][0];
00065                 Result[0][2] = m[2][0];
00066                 Result[1][0] = m[0][1];
00067                 Result[1][1] = m[1][1];
00068                 Result[1][2] = m[2][1];
00069                 Result[2][0] = m[0][2];
00070                 Result[2][1] = m[1][2];
00071                 Result[2][2] = m[2][2];
00072                 return Result;
00073         }
00074 
00075         template <typename T, precision P> 
00076         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> rowMajor4(
00077                 const detail::tvec4<T, P>& v1, 
00078                 const detail::tvec4<T, P>& v2, 
00079                 const detail::tvec4<T, P>& v3, 
00080                 const detail::tvec4<T, P>& v4)
00081         {
00082                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result;
00083                 Result[0][0] = v1.x;
00084                 Result[1][0] = v1.y;
00085                 Result[2][0] = v1.z;
00086                 Result[3][0] = v1.w;
00087                 Result[0][1] = v2.x;
00088                 Result[1][1] = v2.y;
00089                 Result[2][1] = v2.z;
00090                 Result[3][1] = v2.w;
00091                 Result[0][2] = v3.x;
00092                 Result[1][2] = v3.y;
00093                 Result[2][2] = v3.z;
00094                 Result[3][2] = v3.w;
00095                 Result[0][3] = v4.x;
00096                 Result[1][3] = v4.y;
00097                 Result[2][3] = v4.z;
00098                 Result[3][3] = v4.w;
00099                 return Result;
00100         }

00102         template <typename T, precision P> 
00103         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> rowMajor4(
00104                 const detail::tmat4x4<T, P>& m)
00105         {
00106                 detail::tmat4x4<T, P> Result;
00107                 Result[0][0] = m[0][0];
00108                 Result[0][1] = m[1][0];
00109                 Result[0][2] = m[2][0];
00110                 Result[0][3] = m[3][0];
00111                 Result[1][0] = m[0][1];
00112                 Result[1][1] = m[1][1];
00113                 Result[1][2] = m[2][1];
00114                 Result[1][3] = m[3][1];
00115                 Result[2][0] = m[0][2];
00116                 Result[2][1] = m[1][2];
00117                 Result[2][2] = m[2][2];
00118                 Result[2][3] = m[3][2];
00119                 Result[3][0] = m[0][3];
00120                 Result[3][1] = m[1][3];
00121                 Result[3][2] = m[2][3];
00122                 Result[3][3] = m[3][3];
00123                 return Result;
00124         }

00126         template <typename T, precision P> 
00127         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat2x2<T, P> colMajor2(
00128                 const detail::tvec2<T, P>& v1, 
00129                 const detail::tvec2<T, P>& v2)
00130         {
00131                 return detail::tmat2x2<T, P>(v1, v2);
00132         }

00134         template <typename T, precision P> 
00135         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat2x2<T, P> colMajor2(
00136                 const detail::tmat2x2<T, P>& m)
00137         {
00138                 return detail::tmat2x2<T, P>(m);
00139         }

00142         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat3x3<T, P> colMajor3(

00144                 const detail::tvec3<T, P>& v2, 
00145                 const detail::tvec3<T, P>& v3)

00158         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tmat4x4<T, P> colMajor4(
